main.title: Un buen diseño agrega valor más de lo que agrega costo.
main.description: Hi there! I'm Tatiana, a passionate computer science student at Universidad de Antioquia, Colombia. My focus is on software and web development, and I thrive on transforming ideas into innovative applications. I'm not just about the code, though; I'm equally fascinated by crafting dynamic and interactive user experiences that resonate with people.
